ace-metadata-files.description: ACE system metadata files for tracking pattern insights and reflector analysis

reflector-agent-output.description: Output files generated by ACE's Reflector agent for pattern analysis

metadata-driven-architecture.description: Use structured metadata (YAML frontmatter) to track file properties and generation state

incremental-learning-system.description: System that accumulates insights over time through observation and reflection

machine-generated-documentation.description: Automatically generate and maintain documentation files rather than manual updates

explicit-empty-state.description: Document when data structures are empty rather than leaving them implicit

structured-metadata.description: Use YAML frontmatter to separate metadata from content in documentation files

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file structure and content analysis of ACE metadata file
metadata.notes: This is a template/placeholder file with no actual coding patterns yet. Discovered domains relate to the ACE metadata system architecture itself.
